**2022-09-28 / @rsc, @griesemer, @bradfitz, @aclements, @julieqiu**

**Accepted**

- **go/ast: record start and end of file in File.FileStart, File.FileEnd** [#53202](https://go.dev/issue/53202)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: add UDPMsg, (\*UDPConn).ReadUDPMsgs, (\*UDPConn).WriteUDPMsgs** [#45886](https://go.dev/issue/45886)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **crypto/x509: expose hash algorithm for SignatureAlgorithm** [#33317](https://go.dev/issue/33317)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **crypto: add SignContext** [#28427](https://go.dev/issue/28427)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **math/rand: add Reader variable** [#16776](https://go.dev/issue/16776)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **runtime: add HeapMarked to MemStats** [#51966](https://go.dev/issue/51966)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **build: adopt Go 1.20 as bootstrap toolchain for Go 1.22** [#54265](https://go.dev/issue/54265)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **cmd/compile: profile-guided optimization** [#55022](https://go.dev/issue/55022)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **math/rand: deprecate Read** [#20661](https://go.dev/issue/20661)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **math/rand: seed global generator randomly** [#54880](https://go.dev/issue/54880)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/time/rate: add Sometimes type** [#54237](https://go.dev/issue/54237)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **cmd/vet: add static analysis pass to check whether bytes.Buffer should be replace by strings.Builder** [#54988](https://go.dev/issue/54988)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/text: expose MIBenum via identifier package** [#47577](https://go.dev/issue/47577)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Active**

- **archive/tar, archive/zip: add ErrInsecurePath** [#55356](https://go.dev/issue/55356)
